alternative_parents.description: Benzoic acids carrying a halogen atom on the benzene ring.
alternative_parents.name: Halobenzoic acids

alternative_parents.description: Benzoic acids carrying a halogen atom at the 3-position of the benzene ring.
alternative_parents.name: 3-halobenzoic acids

alternative_parents.description: Benzoic acids carrying a halogen atom at the 2-position of the benzene ring.
alternative_parents.name: 2-halobenzoic acids

alternative_parents.description: Organic Compounds containing a benzene ring which bears at least one carboxyl group.
alternative_parents.name: Benzoic acids

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing an acyl moiety of benzoic acid with the formula (C6H5CO-).
alternative_parents.name: Benzoyl derivatives

alternative_parents.description: Aromatic compounds containing 1 carboxyl group and a C-X (X = halogen) group at adjacent positions of an aromatic ring.
alternative_parents.name: 1-carboxy-2-haloaromatic compounds

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing one or more chlorine atoms attached to a benzene moiety.
alternative_parents.name: Chlorobenzenes

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing exactly two carboxylic acid groups.
alternative_parents.name: Dicarboxylic acids and derivatives

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing the acyl chloride functional group.
alternative_parents.name: Aryl chlorides

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing a halogen atom, which is indirectly attached to a carbonyl via an intervening vinyl (>C=C<) moiety.
alternative_parents.name: Vinylogous halides

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing a bond between a carbon atom and an oxygen atom.
alternative_parents.name: Organooxygen compounds

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a chemical bond between a carbon atom and a chlorine atom.
alternative_parents.name: Organochlorides

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing an oxide group.
alternative_parents.name: Organic oxides

alternative_parents.description: Derivatives of hydrocarbons obtained by substituting one or more carbon atoms by an heteroatom. They contain at least one carbon atom and heteroatom.
alternative_parents.name: Hydrocarbon derivatives

class.description: Aromatic compounds containing one monocyclic ring system consisting of benzene.
class.name: Benzene and substituted derivatives

description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as p-phthalic acid and derivatives. These are compounds containing a benzene ring bearing a carboxylic acid group at ring carbon atoms 1 and 4.

direct_parent.description: Compounds containing a benzene ring bearing a carboxylic acid group at ring carbon atoms 1 and 4.
direct_parent.name: P-phthalic acid and derivatives

intermediate_nodes.description: Compounds containing a phthalic acid moiety (or a derivative thereof), which is a benzene ring bearing a carboxylic acid group at two different ring positions. Isomers of phthalic acid include meta-phthalic acid (benzene-1,3-dioic acid), ortho-phthalic acid (benzene-1,2-dioic acid), and para-phthalic acid (benzene-1,4-dioic acid).
intermediate_nodes.name: Phthalic acid and derivatives

kingdom.description: Compounds that contain at least one carbon atom, excluding isocyanide/cyanide and their non-hydrocarbyl derivatives, thiophosgene, carbon diselenide, carbon monosulfide, carbon disulfide, carbon subsulfide, carbon monoxide, carbon dioxide, Carbon suboxide, and dicarbon monoxide.
kingdom.name: Organic compounds

subclass.description: Organic compounds containing a carboxylic acid substituent attached to a benzene ring.
subclass.name: Benzoic acids and derivatives

superclass.description: Aromatic compounds containing one or more benzene rings.
superclass.name: Benzenoids
